summary: Removes the boom noise when you mouseover a map icon
descriptionHtml:
I own a 7.1 surround system with a subwoofer at my PC desk,  so whenever I would mouseover a map icon I would get that BOOM noise that followed.

Well no longer, I silenced the boom sounds on the world map and thought I would upload it in case somebody else wanted to use it.  It doesn\'t silence the click, just the boom that follows the click.


Installation
==========

1) Extract the .rar file
2) Copy the Data folder
3) Navigate to your main Skyrim folder and paste it there. Merge with existing data folder.



Other Sound Changing mods by myself and others
==========================================
